name: Monster Lair
description: A marker indicating the presence of dangerous creatures creates opportunities for combat and potential rewards. The dangerous nature creates opportunities for combat and valuable materials, while the monster presence creates constant danger and potential death.
atmosphere: Territorial markings and scattered remains warn of dangerous creatures while the air carries predator musk and death. Crude dens or elaborate lairs house monsters and their treasures. Fresh kills and territorial displays mark the boundaries. Enter at your own risk - few return from these deadly domains.
